discussion.p: The term 'direct non-list initialization' needs to be incorporated from the Library Fundamentals TS, as several components added to C++17 rely on this definition.

blockquote.p:
17.3.X direct-non-list-initialization [defns.direct-non-list-init]
A direct-initialization that is not list-initialization.

discussion.p: Accepted as Immediate to resolve NB comment.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4618.

li.p: Add the following to as indicated:

p.ins: A direct-initialization that is not list-initialization.
